paper_keywords: Fluid limit for partially ionized plasmas
Glow discharge interacting with an ion beam
paper_abstract: We derive a fluid model for partially ionized plasmas in which the dominant collisional process is not only driven by elastic collisions against neutrals, but also by ionization/recombination processes, especially concerning the electrons. In terms of applications, these models correspond to the interaction of a glow discharge with an ion beam. Crown Copyright (C) 2008 Published by Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A strong ionization model in plasma physics
